text: The 2011 World Modern Penthathlon Championship was held in Moscow, Russia from September 8 to September 14, 2011. The event was supposed to take place in Cairo but because of the 2011 Egyptian revolution it was moved to avoid any further political instability. The event includes pistol shooting, fencing, 200m swimming, show jumping and a 3 km run. For the first time laser pistols were used.Pentathlon.org - UIPM Awards 2011 Senior World Championships to Moscow ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#efefef" |
